document.masterDocTitle: The checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India

subSubSection.paragraph:
1.
Anaglyptus dolosulus Holzschuh, 2006
Anaglyptus dolosulus Holzschuh, 2006 : 484 pl. XI, fig. 2 (HT ♂). Type locality: India: UP (HT ♂), CCH.
Agalophis longispinis Gardner, 1939 : 9 (P. n., m.s.); Gardner, 1939 ; Mitra et al., 2015: 5 (Distr.). Type locality: India: WB Lopchu, Darjeeling (HT ♂); BMNH.
Anaglyptus (Anaglyptus) longispinnis Löbl & Smetana, 2010 : 144 (Cat., m. s.). Distribution: India (Sikkim; WB: Darjeeling Distr., Lopchu).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Aglaophis marmoratus
Holzschuh, 1982b : 153
fig. 8 (HT, ♀);
Weigel, 2006 : 501
(Distr.)
Type locality:
India : Uttaranchal , Almora Distr. (HT ♀ ); CCH
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: India ( Uttarakhand : Kumaon Himalaya, Almora, Ranikhet-Chaubattia) & Nepal .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Aglaophis ulmiphilus
Holzschuh, 1982b : 153
fig. 9 (HT ♂) (P. n.).
Type locality:
Pakistan ; Hazara Dist. of Abbottabad (HT ♀ ); CCH .
Anaglyptus
(Anaglyptus) ulmiphilus
Löbl & Smetana, 2010 : 144
(Cat.)
.
Distribution :
India ( Jammu & Kashmir : Kashmir , Distr., Anantnag , Lahinvan , Gulmarg , Khanspur ) & Pakistan :

subSubSection.paragraph:
Anaglyptus ( Aglaophis )
Gressitt, 1951b :
302 ( type locality:
Aglaophis fasciata Thomson, 1857
); Original desg.
Aglaophis Thomson, 1857f : 315

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anaglyptus fasciatus
Holzschuh, 2006 : 484
, pl. XI, fig. 3 ( ♂ ) (Distr., P. n.);
Weigel, 2006 : 501
(Distr.).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: India (WB: Darjeeling Distr.) & Nepal : Langtang Khola, Sherpagaon.

2.
Anaglyptus
(Aglaophis) humerosus ( Chevrolat, 1863 )
Epodus humerosus Chevrolat, 1863 : 336
; Gahan, 1906 : 303, fig. 98, (Fauna). Type locality: India Orientalis (HT); MNHNP.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anaglyptus
(Aglaophis) humerosus
Löbl & Smetana, 2010 : 143
(Cat.)
. Distribution: India .

Oligoenoplus
Chevrolat, 1863 :
337
( type sp.:
Oligoenoplus ventralis Chevrolat, 1863
);
Borneoclytus
Dauber, 2006 : 443
( type sp.:
Borneoclytus borneanus Dauber, 2006
).
